data.text:
Intercultural Learning & Global Community

HRH Prince Hassan bin Talal and HRH Princess Sarvath El Hassan emphasise the importance of intercultural learning, global citizenship, and the global communityâ€™s responsibility to care for one another and our world, key pillars of the values system held at the core of our community at ICS.
